modName: BRG The Gourmet - Food And Ingredients
summary: BRG The Gourmet adds so far 200+ new foods, 600+ new ingredients, 10 new placeable crafting station and a new cooking system to skyrim. Every food and ingredient has been added to skyrim creatures and leveled lists. Works perfectly with any other cooking/survival mod.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff0000][b][size=5][i][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff0000][color=#e06666]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/SRkZaa4.png[/img][/color][/color][/font][/i][/size][/b][/color][/font][/size][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][size=6][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff0000][b][size=6][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff0000][b]
[/b][/color][/font][/size][/b][/color][/font][/size]

BRG the gourmet[/b] is not an overhaul but an expansion and a resource for other mods.
This mod introduce in Skyrim a wide yet simple and clean cooking system based
on variety with maximum compatibility for any other mod. You will be able to prepare
ingredients in many different ways before cooking or eating them, each one
with it's own unique effects. Currently this mod features [b]200+ Foods, 700+ Ingredients,[/b][/size][/font][b]
[/b][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][b]1000+ Smart recipes, 10 Craftable cooking stations, High customisation[/b] through MCM.


[/font][/size][font=Trebuchet MS][youtube]-xGEHEhWUCM[/youtube]
[youtube]nPuLqyfvYvI[/youtube]

[/font][font=Trebuchet MS]
[/font][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff0000][size=5][i][color=#efefef][size=6][b]Requirments[/b][/size][/color][/i][/size][/color][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff0000][size=5][size=3]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Y7Gm6Oo.png[/img]
[/size][/size][/color][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][color=#1e84cc]
1. Hearthfires
2. [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] 1.7.03 or greater
3. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SKY UI[/url] 5.0 or greater[/color][/size][/font][color=#efefef][i][size=5]


[/size][/i][/color][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff0000][size=5][color=#efefef][i][size=6][b]How to get started[/b][/size][/i][/color][size=3]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Y7Gm6Oo.png[/img][size=2]
[/size][/size][/size][/color][size=3][size=3][color=#1e84cc][size=4][b][color=#f4f4f4][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]
In the archive under the document folder you will find [b]BRG Reference Guide[/b],
[u]Please read it[/u] or you might get confused playing this mod.[/size][/font][/color]

Install[/b][/size][/color][/size]

[/size][/font][list]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Extract the bsa and the esp file in your Skyrim\data folder.[/size][/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Activate the esp.                                                                  [/size][/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Enter the game and Activate the mod through MCM menu.[/size][/font]
[/list][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][size=3][color=#1e84cc][size=4][b]
Uninstall[/b][/size][/color][/size]
[/size][/font][/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]
[/size][/font][list]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Deactivate the mod through MCM menu.                              [/size][/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Disable the esp and delete bsa and esp in your data folder.[/size][/font]
[/list][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][size=3][color=#1e84cc][size=4][b]Update[/b][/size][/color][/size]

[/size][/font][/size][/font][b]Updating to 0.7.3[/b]:                                                    
[/size][/font][list]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Uninstall the mod Through MCM menu.                           [/size][/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Replace the files in your Skyrim\data folder.                   [/size][/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Enter the game and Activate the mod with MCM menu.[/size][/font]
[/list]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b]Updating after 0.7.3[/b]:                                                   [/size][/font]
[/size][/font][list]
[*][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Replace the files in your Skyrim\data folder.                  [/size][/font][/size]
[/list]


[size=6][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff0000][color=#efefef][i][b]Compatibility[/b][/i][/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Y7Gm6Oo.png[/img]
[/color][/font][/size]
[size=3]This Mod is fully compatible with almost any mod. A [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W1Es06MtAZM]bashed patch[/url] is recommended.
Check the reference guide in the compatibility section for more informations.


[color=#1e84cc][size=4][b]Recommended Mods[/b][/size][/color][color=#1e84cc][size=4]:[/size][/color]

[/size][list]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51473/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D51473&pUp=1]iNeed                    [/url][/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25903/?]No salty food         [/url][/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52583/?]Jaxon's Positioner[/url][/size]
[/list][size=6][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff0000][b]
[color=#efefef][i]Things to do[/i][/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Y7Gm6Oo.png[/img][/b][/color][/font][/size][size=2]                    [/size][list]
[*][size=2]Add effects to each ingedient (20%)      [/size]
[*][size=2]Add Intestines                                   [/size]
[*][size=2][s]Add Eyeballs (100%)[/s]                            [/size]
[*][size=2]Add Theeth/claws/tusks                     [/size]
[*][size=2]HD textures (25%)                              [/size]
[*][size=2]New Chopped Mesh                           [/size]
[*][size=2]Better Sausages/[s]Pie[/s] Collision (50%)       [/size]
[*][size=2]Add New advanced recipes (25%)          [/size]
[/list][font=Trebuchet MS][size=6][color=#ff0000][b]
[i][color=#efefef]Troubleshooting
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Y7Gm6Oo.png[/img][/color][/i][/b][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff0000][size=5][size=3]
[/size][/size][/color][/font][size=3]If you find any bug, wrong spelling, or incompatibility, please report in the bug section.
All inappropriate comments will be moved to the bug section.
Check out the [u]F.A.Q. section[/u] in the reference guide before commenting or
your comment may be ignored if already present in guide.[/size][size=3]


[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#1e84cc][size=4][b]Patch notes[/b][/size][/color][/font]

[/size][list]
[*][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][size=3][b]v 0.7[/b] [i]Initial release[/i][/size][/size][/font][/size]
[/list][list]
[*][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][size=3][b]v 0.7.1[/b][i] Added MCM menu and missing scripts[/i][/size][/size][/font][/size]
[/list][list]
[*][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][size=3][b]v 0.7.3[/b] [i]Added processing boards and craftable stations and boards, [/i][/size][/size][/font][/size]
[/list][i][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][size=3]Minced HD Textures, Meat HD Textures, Lungs HD Textures
Darker liver Textures, Other Textures\Normal maps fixes, 
Pies\Tarts Collisions fixed,  [/size][/size][/font][/size][/i][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][size=3][i]Inventory display items fix,
Invisible Fried egg bottom fixed.[/i]
[list]
[*][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][size=3][b]v 0.7.4[/b] [i]Added Chicken Feathers, New Troll Meat Mesh and texture,[/i][/size][/size][/font][/size]
[/list][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][size=3][i]40+ textures fixed, Added effects to every food (~200).
[list]
[*][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][size=3][b]v 0.7.5[/b][i][/i][/size][/size][/font][/size][size=3][size=5][size=3][i] Fixed and optimized script, Modular creatures ingredients, [/i][/size][/size][/size][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][size=3][i][size=3][size=5][size=3][size=3][size=5][size=3][i][size=3][size=5][size=3][size=3][size=5][size=3][i]Minor fixes.[/i][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/i][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/i][/size][/size][/font][/size]
[/list][/i][/size][/size][/font][/size][/size][/size][/font][/size][list]
[*][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][size=3][b]v 0.[i]8 [/i][/b][i]Added Eyeballs to creatures, Stocks, Meatballs[/i][/size][/size][/font][/size]
[/list][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][size=3][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][size=3][i][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][size=3][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][size=3][i][size=3]Lungs puddings, Dwemer crafting stations,  forging now is optional.
Script routines and recipes fixed. Drinks sounds and properties fixed.[/size][/i][/size][/size][/font][/size][/size][/size][/font][/size]
[/i][/size][/size][i][list]
[size=5][*][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][size=3][b]v 0.8a[/b][i][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][size=3][i] Added Recipes Book, fixed Fruit Processing.[/i][/size][/size][/font][/size][/i][/size][/size][/font][/size]
[/size][/list][/i][/font][/size][/size][/size][/font][/size]
